name: FlowerAttraction
description:
The result of a 6 hour GameJam.

The theme was: Attraction.

Help the bumble bee to get its favorite flowers. With every flower, the attraction to the flowers rises.
5 playable levels. Earn stars in each level and beat your own highscore!

Everything (except music) is self-made during the 6 hours by myself without copying old code.

Music/Sound is CC0 from freesound.org.
